QuestData.Title: Impatience
QuestData.Description: Damn that dwarf. He's always getting me in trouble with Fiona. Look at her! She won't even TALK to me!$b$bI'm going to stay here and try to mend my friendship with our worgen friend. Would you mind going out and making sure Gidwin is alright? I'm sure he's fine; he knows how to take care of himself. He headed north, and he can't have gone far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Gidwin Goldbraids in Northdale.
QuestData.CompletionText: Northdale is home to a few ghosts and banshees. Nothing ol' Giddy can't handle.
QuestData.RewardText: You didn't see him? Where could he have gone then?$b$bHis... his prayer book? Why would he leave that behind?$b$bOh...$b$bBy the Light, what have I done?
